snippet.title: Ready Set Indie Games Presents: Dunwell (PC)
snippet.description:
In this gameplay video from Ready Set Indie Games, TripG87 Plays Dunwell on PC.

Dunewell is a dungeon crawler meets puzzle game in which you have to solve puzzles to advance through the dungeon. The game for me was very challenging but I really did enjoy it.

If you would like to play Dunwell for yourself you can do so for free at:

https://davidstyrbjorn.itch.io/dunwell

The game is playable on the following platforms:
PC -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/readysetindiegames
